data.description: While ironing, this percentage of material is extruded on top of the last layer.
data.img_description: This model has ironing applied to it, the flow of the ironing applied is increased to 20%.
data.hints: - There is always a little extrusion needed when ironing. This prevents oozing and ensures the tiny gaps on the top layers are filled.
data.notes: Note: Do not increase the ironing flow without increasing the 'ironing line spacing', as this will result in over-extrusion.
